description.narrative: For GGF grant will be used to support the African Center for Biosafety (ACB) in implementing projects in three focus areas: (1) building a knowledge network on soil fertility and seed sovereignty amongst small scale farmer support organization, (2) building capacity and understanding of the harmonization of seed laws in the SADS/COMESA region, (3) responding to the expansion of GMOs in Africa. The group plans to conduct extensive research on fertilizers and agrochemicals, carry out field research in Malawi and Tanzania on soil fertility and seeds, facilitate regional seminars and capacity building workshops, produce publications and share information on seed trade laws and GMOs, launch public awareness campaigns on GMOs and labeling laws, host Biosafety lawyers training course in Johannesburg, and establish partnerships with like minded groups and networks.
